column6:
The Circus is in town! Sounds fun, right? Not if it's the CIRCUS OF CRIME! When Peter Parker goes to take pictures of a night under the big-top for the Daily Bugle, Spider-Man gets blamed for robbing the audience! How does he escape this magic trick?,2007,3
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
column8: | colorist:Guru-eFX | writer:Chris Kipiniak | inker:Roland Paris | penciller (cover):Patrick Scherberger | letterer:Dave Sharpe
